Name: Nmap
Description: Nmap is a versatile open-source network scanner that helps in network discovery and security auditing.
HTU: Install Nmap, run `nmap <target>` to scan the network, and analyze the results.

Name: Angry IP Scanner
Description: Angry IP Scanner is a fast and open-source network scanning tool that is easy to use and provides detailed information.
HTU: Install Angry IP Scanner, configure the IP range, run the scan, and review the output.

Name: Advanced IP Scanner
Description: Advanced IP Scanner is a fast and free network scanner for Windows, providing a comprehensive range of information about network devices.
HTU: Download and install Advanced IP Scanner, run a scan of the network, and view the detailed information about each device.

Name: Masscan
Description: Masscan is an Internet-scale port scanner capable of scanning the entire Internet in under 6 minutes.
HTU: Install Masscan, run `masscan <target>` with the desired options, and analyze the scan results.

Name: ZMap
Description: ZMap is a fast single-packet network scanner designed for Internet-wide network surveys.
HTU: Install ZMap, configure the target IP range, and run the scan to gather network data.
